name: Rat Stack
text: You coordinate efficiently in tight spaces.
benefit: You can occupy the same square with up to two other creatures that also have this feat. If all participants also have the Tunnel Rat<sup></sup> feat, up to four creatures can share the same space.
text_zh: 你在紧密的空间中可以有效地调整身姿。
benefit_zh: 你可以和至多2个拥有这个专长的其他生物共同占据一个方格。如果这些参与者也都拥有坑道鼠专长（Tunnel Rat，ARG），那么最多4个生物可以占据一个方格。
